channel.title: Arduino on AMRIUNIX
channel.description: Recent content in Arduino on AMRIUNIX

item.title: HC 06 Bluetooth in Ubuntu
item.description: TL;DR Link to heading In this article we are going see how to connect HC-06 Bluetooth in Ubuntu, which is commonly used in embedded systems such as arduino. But this time we will see how to use it with linux in order to interact with bluetooth channels. Configuration Link to heading So first thing first we need to pair this device with ubuntu using the Bluetooth GUI in Ubuntu .
